ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Functions for Discriminant Analysis and Classification purposes covering various methods such as descriptive, geometric, linear, quadratic, PLS, as well as qualitative discriminant analyses
Functions for Discriminant Analysis and Classification purposes covering various methods such as descriptive, geometric, linear, quadratic, PLS, as well as qualitative discriminant analyses

name: r-discriminer
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1-29' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-discriminer
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/DiscriMiner_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/DiscriMiner/DiscriMiner_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5aab7671086ef9940e030324651976456f0e84dab35edb7048693ade885228c6

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1007
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('DiscriMiner')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('DiscriMiner')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.gastonsanchez.com
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Functions for Discriminant Analysis and Classification purposes covering various methods
    such as descriptive, geometric, linear, quadratic, PLS, as well as qualitative discriminant
    analyses
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
